89 Alliance of Civic Technologists 🏛️💻

Oct 29, 2024

  • civictech
  • episode
  • service
  • network
  • volunteering
  • government
  • grassroots

We’re joined by Christopher Whitaker, Executive Director of the Alliance of Civic Technologists (ACT) to talk about the organization and it’s upcoming membership drive. ACT seeks to fill the vacuum left by the sunsetting of the old Code for America Brigade Network program. We’ll talk about how the volunteer space, how they plan to operate in it, and their vision for the future.
